name: Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Victory
name_original: Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Victory
description: 'Dragon Quest: Monster Battle Road Victory' (ドラゴンクエスト モンスターバトルロードビクトリー) is an RPG fighting spin-off video game released for the Nintendo Wii. Part of the Dragon Quest franchise, it was only released in Japan on July 15th, 2010. Based on the arcade machine equivalents, the set-up contained many optional devices, including a sword home remote with arcade-like buttons on the side, and a Nintendo DSi to wirelessly scan physical cards into the Wii (optional).
